name: To Shore once more
description:
Avast! Looks like you've been caught up in a nasty storm! Rubble and beauties all about! Steal your heart and  your fish friend and push though to make it to land once more! How many can you shoot down , and think ya can bring back a good haul back to shore?

Controls:

WASD/ Arrows to Move

Space to Shoot your fish buddy.

LShift to slow down and show hit box (Note: Not a shield)

Last  30 seconds to win in this Danmaku inspired game!

Made for Mini jam 108: Seaside.

Developed by Revian.  Assets made by Combination of Open resouce art from artists at Opengameart.org, and some made specifically for this game by BananaBone

Music and sound effects is royalty free  from site mentioned above

Thank you for playing my game,  how high a score did you get! 
If you find any bugs....  Sorry bout that. But in the meantime,  maybe they'd be good as fish bait?
